card.name: Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran
card.text: Whenever Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran attacks, attacking red creatures get +2/+0 and attacking white creatures get +0/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Auratouched Mage
card.text: When Auratouched Mage enters the battlefield, search your library for an Aura card that could enchant it. If Auratouched Mage is still on the battlefield, put that Aura card onto the battlefield attached to it. Otherwise, reveal the Aura card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Barbarian Riftcutter
card.text: {R}, Sacrifice Barbarian Riftcutter: Destroy target land.

card.name: Bathe in Light
card.text: Radiance - Choose a color. Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Belltower Sphinx
card.text: Flying Whenever a source deals damage to Belltower Sphinx, that source's controller puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Benevolent Ancestor
card.text: Defender {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Birds of Paradise
card.text: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Blazing Archon
card.text: Flying Creatures can't attack you.

card.name: Blockbuster
card.text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice Blockbuster: Blockbuster deals 3 damage to each tapped creature and each player.

card.name: Blood Funnel
card.text: Noncreature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, counter that spell unless you sacrifice a creature.

card.name: Bloodbond March
card.text: Whenever a player casts a creature spell, each player returns all cards with the same name as that spell from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Bloodletter Quill
card.text: {2}, {T}, Put a blood counter on Bloodletter Quill: Draw a card, then you lose 1 life for each blood counter on Bloodletter Quill. {U}{B}: Remove a blood counter from Bloodletter Quill.

card.name: Boros Fury-Shield
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking or blocking creature this turn. If {R} was spent to cast Boros Fury-Shield, it deals damage to that creature's controller equal to the creature's power.

card.name: Boros Garrison
card.text: Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped. When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Boros Guildmage
card.text: {1}{R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. {1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Boros Recruit
card.text: First strike

card.name: Boros Signet
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Boros Swiftblade
card.text: Double strike

card.name: Bottled Cloister
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, exile all cards from your hand face down. At the beginning of your upkeep, return all cards you own exiled with Bottled Cloister to your hand, then draw a card.

card.name: Brainspoil
card.text: Destroy target creature that isn't enchanted. It can't be regenerated. Transmute {1}{B}{B}

card.name: Bramble Elemental
card.text: Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Bramble Elemental, put two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Breath of Fury
card.text: Enchant creature you control When enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it and attach Breath of Fury to a creature you control. If you do, untap all creatures you control and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Brightflame
card.text: Radiance - Brightflame deals X damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

card.name: Caregiver
card.text: {W}, Sacrifice a creature: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Carrion Howler
card.text: Pay 1 life: Carrion Howler gets +2/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Carven Caryatid
card.text: Defender When Carven Caryatid enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Centaur Safeguard
card.text: When Centaur Safeguard dies, you may gain 3 life.

card.name: Cerulean Sphinx
card.text: Flying {U}: Cerulean Sphinx's owner shuffles it into his or her library.

card.name: Chant of Vitu-Ghazi
card.text: Convoke Prevent all damage that would be dealt by creatures this turn. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

card.name: Char
card.text: Char deals 4 damage to target creature or player and 2 damage to you.

card.name: Chord of Calling
card.text: Convoke Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Chorus of the Conclave
card.text: Forestwalk As an additional cost to cast creature spells, you may pay any amount of mana. If you do, that creature enters the battlefield with that many additional +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Circu, Dimir Lobotomist
card.text: Whenever you cast a blue spell, exile the top card of target library. Whenever you cast a black spell, exile the top card of target library. Your opponents can't cast nonland cards with the same name as a card exiled with Circu, Dimir Lobotomist.

card.name: Civic Wayfinder
card.text: When Civic Wayfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Cleansing Beam
card.text: Radiance - Cleansing Beam deals 2 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.

card.name: Clinging Darkness
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -4/-1.

card.name: Cloudstone Curio
card.text: Whenever a nonartifact permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may return another permanent you control that shares a permanent type with it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Clutch of the Undercity
card.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 3 life. Transmute {1}{U}{B}

card.name: Coalhauler Swine
card.text: Whenever Coalhauler Swine is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to each player.

card.name: Compulsive Research
card.text: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless he or she discards a land card.

card.name: Concerted Effort
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, all creatures you control gain flying until end of turn if a creature you control has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, landwalk, protection, trample, and vigilance.

card.name: Conclave Phalanx
card.text: Convoke When Conclave Phalanx enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

card.name: Conclave's Blessing
card.text: Convoke Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 for each other creature you control.

card.name: Congregation at Dawn
card.text: Search your library for up to three creature cards and reveal them. Shuffle your library, then put those cards on top of it in any order.

card.name: Consult the Necrosages
card.text: Choose one - Target player draws two cards; or target player discards two cards.

card.name: Convolute

card.name: Copy Enchantment
card.text: You may have Copy Enchantment enter the battlefield as a copy of any enchantment on the battlefield.

card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Crown of Convergence
card.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed. As long as the top card of your library is a creature card, creatures you control that share a color with that card get +1/+1. {G}{W}: Put the top card of your library on the bottom of your library.

card.text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature, then return Cyclopean Snare to its owner's hand.

card.name: Dimir Guildmage
card.text: {3}{U}: Target player draws a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. {3}{B}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.text: Dimir Infiltrator can't be blocked. Transmute {1}{U}{B}

card.text: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Transmute {1}{U}{U}

card.name: Dogpile
card.text: Dogpile deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of attacking creatures you control.

card.name: Doubling Season
card.text: If an effect would put one or more tokens onto the battlefield under your control, it puts twice that many of those tokens onto the battlefield instead. If an effect would place one or more counters on a permanent you control, it places twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

card.text: {2}{G}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.text: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery card, exile it. Then that player copies each instant or sorcery card exiled with Eye of the Storm. For each copy, the player may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Faith's Fetters
card.text: Enchant permanent When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. Enchanted permanent's activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities. If enchanted permanent is a creature, it can't attack or block.

card.name: Farseek
card.text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.text: Change the target of target activated ability with a single target. Draw a card.

card.name: Ribbons of Night
card.text: Ribbons of Night deals 4 damage to target creature and you gain 4 life. If {U} was spent to cast Ribbons of Night, draw a card.

card.name: Rolling Spoil
card.text: Destroy target land. If {B} was spent to cast Rolling Spoil, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Roofstalker Wight
card.text: {1}{U}: Roofstalker Wight gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Root-Kin Ally
card.text: Convoke Tap two untapped creatures you control: Root-Kin Ally gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Sabertooth Alley Cat
card.text: Sabertooth Alley Cat attacks each turn if able. {1}{R}: Creatures without defender can't block Sabertooth Alley Cat this turn.

card.name: Sacred Foundry
card.text: As Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Sadistic Augermage
card.text: When Sadistic Augermage dies, each player puts a card from his or her hand on top of his or her library.

card.name: Sandsower
card.text: Tap three untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.

card.name: Savra, Queen of the Golgari
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a black creature, you may pay 2 life. If you do, each other player sacrifices a creature. Whenever you sacrifice a green creature, you may gain 2 life.

card.name: Scatter the Seeds
card.text: Convoke Put three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Scion of the Wild
card.text: Scion of the Wild's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Screeching Griffin
card.text: Flying {R}: Target creature can't block Screeching Griffin this turn.

card.name: Searing Meditation
card.text: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, Searing Meditation deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Seed Spark
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If {G} was spent to cast Seed Spark, put two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Seeds of Strength
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Seismic Spike
card.text: Destroy target land. Add {R}{R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Selesnya Evangel
card.text: {1}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Selesnya Guildmage
card.text: {3}{G}: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. {3}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Selesnya Sagittars
card.text: Reach Selesnya Sagittars can block an additional creature.

card.name: Selesnya Sanctuary
card.text: Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped. When Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}{W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Selesnya Signet
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add {G}{W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Sell-Sword Brute
card.text: When Sell-Sword Brute dies, it deals 2 damage to you.

card.name: Sewerdreg
card.text: Swampwalk Sacrifice Sewerdreg: Exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Shadow of Doubt
card.text: Players can't search libraries this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Shambling Shell
card.text: Sacrifice Shambling Shell: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Dredge 3

card.name: Shred Memory
card.text: Exile up to four target cards from a single graveyard. Transmute {1}{B}{B}

card.name: Sins of the Past
card.text: Until end of turn, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead. Exile Sins of the Past.

card.name: Sisters of Stone Death
card.text: {G}: Target creature blocks Sisters of Stone Death this turn if able. {B}{G}: Exile target creature blocking or blocked by Sisters of Stone Death. {2}{B}: Put a creature card exiled with Sisters of Stone Death onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Skyknight Legionnaire
card.text: Flying, haste

card.name: Smash
card.text: Destroy target artifact. Draw a card.

card.name: Sparkmage Apprentice
card.text: When Sparkmage Apprentice enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Spawnbroker
card.text: When Spawnbroker enters the battlefield, you may exchange control of target creature you control and target creature with power less than or equal to that creature's power an opponent controls.

card.name: Spectral Searchlight
card.text: {T}: Choose a player. That player adds one mana of any color he or she chooses to his or her mana pool.

card.name: Stasis Cell
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. {3}{U}: Attach Stasis Cell to target creature.

card.name: Stinkweed Imp
card.text: Flying Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. Dredge 5

card.name: Stone-Seeder Hierophant
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, untap Stone-Seeder Hierophant. {T}: Untap target land.

card.name: Stoneshaker Shaman
card.text: At the beginning of each player's end step, that player sacrifices an untapped land.

card.name: Strands of Undeath
card.text: Enchant creature When Strands of Undeath enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards. {B}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

card.name: Sundering Vitae
card.text: Convoke Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Sunforger
Sunhome Enforcer
card.text: Whenever Sunhome Enforcer deals combat damage, you gain that much life. {1}{R}: Sunhome Enforcer gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Sunhome, Fortress of the Legion
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Suppression Field
card.text: Activated abilities cost {2} more to activate unless they're mana abilities.

card.name: Surge of Zeal
card.text: Radiance - Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Surveilling Sprite
card.text: Flying When Surveilling Sprite dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Svogthos, the Restless Tomb
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {3}{B}{G}: Until end of turn, Svogthos, the Restless Tomb becomes a black and green Plant Zombie creature with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard." It's still a land.

card.name: Szadek, Lord of Secrets
card.text: Flying If Szadek, Lord of Secrets would deal combat damage to a player, instead put that many +1/+1 counters on Szadek and that player puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Tattered Drake
card.text: Flying {B}: Regenerate Tattered Drake.

card.name: Telling Time
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Temple Garden
card.text: As Temple Garden enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Temple Garden enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Terraformer
card.text: {1}: Choose a basic land type. Each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.

card.name: Terrarion
card.text: Terrarion enters the battlefield tapped. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Terrarion: Add two mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool. When Terrarion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Thoughtpicker Witch
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Look at the top two cards of target opponent's library, then exile one of them.

card.name: Three Dreams
card.text: Search your library for up to three Aura cards with different names, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Thundersong Trumpeter
card.text: {T}: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

card.name: Tidewater Minion
card.text: Defender {4}: Tidewater Minion loses defender until end of turn. {T}: Untap target permanent.

card.name: Tolsimir Wolfblood
card.text: Other green creatures you control get +1/+1. Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Put a legendary 2/2 green and white Wolf creature token named Voja onto the battlefield.

card.name: Torpid Moloch
card.text: Defender Sacrifice three lands: Torpid Moloch loses defender until end of turn.

card.name: Transluminant
card.text: {W}, Sacrifice Transluminant: Put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Trophy Hunter
card.text: {1}{G}: Trophy Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature with flying. Whenever a creature with flying dealt damage by Trophy Hunter this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Trophy Hunter.

card.name: Tunnel Vision
card.text: Name a card. Target player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until the named card is revealed. If it is, that player puts the rest of the revealed cards into his or her graveyard and puts the named card on top of his or her library. Otherwise, the player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Twilight Drover
card.text: Whenever a creature token leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Twilight Drover. {2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Twilight Drover: Put two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Twisted Justice
card.text: Target player sacrifices a creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power.

card.name: Undercity Shade
card.text: Fear {B}: Undercity Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ursapine
card.text: {G}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Vedalken Dismisser
card.text: When Vedalken Dismisser enters the battlefield, put target creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Vedalken Entrancer
card.text: {U}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Veteran Armorer
card.text: Other creatures you control get +0/+1.

card.name: Viashino Fangtail
card.text: {T}: Viashino Fangtail deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Viashino Slasher
card.text: {R}: Viashino Slasher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Vigor Mortis
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If {G} was spent to cast Vigor Mortis, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Vindictive Mob
card.text: When Vindictive Mob enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature. Vindictive Mob can't be blocked by Saprolings.

card.name: Vinelasher Kudzu
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Vinelasher Kudzu.

card.name: Vitu-Ghazi, the City-Tree
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}{G}{W}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Votary of the Conclave
card.text: {2}{G}: Regenerate Votary of the Conclave.

card.name: Voyager Staff
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice Voyager Staff: Exile target creature. Return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Vulturous Zombie
card.text: Flying Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Vulturous Zombie.

card.name: Warp World
card.text: Each player shuffles all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then reveals that many cards from the top of his or her library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of his or her library.

card.name: War-Torch Goblin
card.text: {R}, Sacrifice War-Torch Goblin: War-Torch Goblin deals 2 damage to target blocking creature.

card.name: Watery Grave
card.text: As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Watery Grave enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Wizened Snitches
card.text: Flying Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.

card.name: Woebringer Demon
card.text: Flying At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature. If the player can't, sacrifice Woebringer Demon.

card.name: Wojek Apothecary
card.text: Radiance - {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it this turn.

card.name: Wojek Embermage
card.text: Radiance - {T}: Wojek Embermage deals 1 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.

card.name: Wojek Siren
card.text: Radiance - Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Woodwraith Corrupter
card.text: {1}{B}{G}, {T}: Target Forest becomes a 4/4 black and green Elemental Horror creature. It's still a land.

card.name: Woodwraith Strangler
card.text: Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Regenerate Woodwraith Strangler.

card.name: Zephyr Spirit
card.text: When Zephyr Spirit blocks, return it to its owner's hand.
